channel.title: Linux Commands on Techtaste
channel.description: Recent content in Linux Commands on Techtaste

item.title: Sys Admin Cmds
item.description: lscpu list of cpus. lsmem list of memory. lsof (list open files) lsof -i tcp:80 df (disk free space) Display free disk space Filesystem Size Used Avail Use% Mounted on /dev/xvda1 32G 4.7G 26G 16% / tmpfs 1.9G 0 1.9G 0% /dev/shm du (disk space usage) du - estimate file space usage du -sh /var/* id $ id uid=501(operations) gid=100(users) groups=100(users) curl curl -I -s google.
